MNNIT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Project Fellow Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 16:47 IST
 Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology, Allahabad
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Uttar Pradesh |  Salary : 37,000 to 37,000




FOLLOW

The Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology (MNNIT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Project Fellow Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech can apply for the MNNIT Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Uttar Pradesh.

MNNIT Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Project Fellow	02	M.E./M. Tech

MNNIT Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 30 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

MNNIT Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

MNNIT Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

MNNIT Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 37,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the MNNIT Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the MNNIT Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

The Office of The Dean, MNNIT Allahabad – 211004.

Important Dates:

Starting date	14-08-2025
Closing date	01-09-2025

Important Dates:

Starting date	14-08-2025
Closing date	01-09-2025
